Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Directs the department of corrections and community supervision to conduct a comprehensive study on deaths in correctional facilities within New York state
Summary: Directs the department of corrections and community supervision to conduct a comprehensive study on deaths in correctional facilities within New York state to provide data-driven insights and recommendations to improve prison conditions, healthcare, and policies to prevent future tragedies.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the department of corrections and community supervision to conduct a comprehensive study on deaths in correctional facilities within New York state
